officialTitle: Palbociclib Treatment Patterns in Swedish Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer - Swedish Ibrance Registries Insights (SIRI)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Patients must meet all of the following inclusion criteria to be eligible for inclusion in the study:

1. One or more (≥1) filled prescription of palbociclib (ATC code: L01XE33)
2. Age ≥18 years at index date

Exclusion Criteria:

There are no exclusion criteria
